name: Bit of Aerosiderite
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  The coastal nations of Teyvat refer to the region beyond the protection of TheSeven as the Dark Sea. It is said that many defeated gods refused to liveunder the new order of The Seven, so they fled to remote islands and becameevil gods. However, their powers came from the same source as Rex Lapis,separate from this all-devouring darkness.
